summary.para: Called by the system when the camera occlusion state changes.

param.name: occlusionStateReport
param.para: An that can be used to obtain the new camera occlusion state.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Register the callback interface by calling .

summary.para: Implemented by applications to receive camera occlusion state change notifications.

remarks.para: Register the callback interface when you create the camera occlusion state monitor with a call to .
